statements: SELECT * FROM reports_on_customer_demographics_and_market_trends;
SELECT report_id, report_date, report_type FROM reports_on_customer_demographics_and_market_trends;
SELECT customer_id, report_date, market_trends_data FROM reports_on_customer_demographics_and_market_trends;
SELECT report_id, report_type, demographic_data FROM reports_on_customer_demographics_and_market_trends;
SELECT * FROM reports_on_customer_demographics_and_market_trends ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM reports_on_customer_demographics_and_market_trends WHERE report_type = 'Survey';
SELECT report_id, customer_id, report_date, report_type FROM reports_on_customer_demographics_and_market_trends WHERE customer_id = '025cc0b2-7f38-4fca-aa7c-6fcf5d683168';
SELECT report_id, report_type, demographic_data->>'age_group' AS age_group FROM reports_on_customer_demographics_and_market_trends WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM reports_on_customer_demographics_and_market_trends WHERE demographic_data->'gender' = '"Male"';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(report_id) AS num_reports FROM reports_on_customer_demographics_and_market_trends GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(report_id) > 1 ORDER BY customer_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customer_demographics ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, age, gender FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT trend_id, trend_name, trend_category FROM market_trends WHERE trend_date > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY trend_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, address FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM market_trends WHERE trend_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY trend_id DESC;
SELECT trend_name, trend_category, trend_date FROM market_trends WHERE trend_description LIKE '%latest%';
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics ORDER BY age ASC, last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, address FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, age, city FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_id, gender, city FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_name, age, gender, city FROM customers
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT customer_name, city FROM customers WHERE city = 'New York'
SELECT customer_name, gender, age FROM customers ORDER BY age
SELECT * FROM CustomerDemographics;
SELECT customer_name, age, location FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT trend_name, industry, trend_year FROM MarketTrends ORDER BY trend_year DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_date, report_details FROM ReportGeneration WHERE trend_id = 3;
SELECT decision_name, decision_date FROM DecisionMaking WHERE decision_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, age FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE gender='Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT trend_id, trend_name, industry, trend_year FROM MarketTrends WHERE trend_year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020 ORDER BY trend_year DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_date, report_details FROM ReportGeneration WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT decision_id, decision_name, decision_date FROM DecisionMaking WHERE decision_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01' ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, location, gender FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE age >= 30 AND location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM customers WHERE customer_location='New York'
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products ORDER BY product_price DESC
SELECT customer_name, customer_gender FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30
SELECT customer_name, customer_location FROM customers WHERE customer_gender='Female'
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_name, customer_gender, customer_location FROM customers WHERE customer_location = 'New York'
SELECT customer_name, customer_age, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchase_amount > 1000
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price < 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT report_id, report_date, report_description FROM reports WHERE report_type = 'Monthly Sales Report'
